channel.title: Im a newb
channel.description: [code] problem: exception in thread "main" java.lang.noclassdeffounderror: client/java base: all servers/files i try to compile rating: 1 [/code] please help im a newb i downloaded the new java version but it still does it, do i have to restart comp? please help. ty!

item.title: Im a newb
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

[quote=“SoLo_DuDe, post:8, topic:39828”]im a retard not a noob, lol, i got it, the code was

@echo off title Yourscape java -Xmx1024m -cp ?///;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server pause
witch idk how it happened so i replaced with

@echo off title Yourscape java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server pause[/quote]

Delete that code and replace it with the code in my perfect compiler tutorial (link is 4 posts aove ^.)

Read full topic
